main event: A UFO was sighted over Hamtramck, Michigan, on March 20, 1967, by two witnesses who observed a brightly lighted object hovering above the trees.
interesting points: The object appeared to be perfectly round and emitted a bright light., The witnesses believed it was too large to be a helicopter and moved at a controlled speed., The sighting lasted approximately 40 seconds., The object disappeared silently without any noise., The investigation concluded it was likely an astronomical object (meteor).
witness description: A couple watching TV who rushed to the window to observe the object.
